page.title: 07 BIOGRAPHY OF A TEENAGER
page.content: I leave my home on a school day at about 8.10 and then walk to the village bus-stop.From here I and the other pupils of Litcham School from my vill- age are picked up by a private bus and are taken to school.We arrive at school at 8.35.A bell rings at 8.55 for regis- ration.After this which ends at 9.20 o- ur lessons begin.Here is a list of the lessons we have and how many times we have them each week:English,Maths and Humanities,we have 6 periods of each of these a week.German,Craft,Physical Education,Science 4 periods,and Music, Art and Drama,2 periods a week.1 lesson lasts for 2 periods and there are 4 le- ssons a day.At 3.30 we go home on the bus.After school I change from my uni- form which I don't like wearing,then do my homework and see my friends or watch T.V.
